channel.title: [PI] NPC dialogue actions [PI] Repp++
channel.description:
hey gues i realy never did something like this :|
so i will need ur help
i understand that i have to make in actionhandler that if u click on that npc, it opens that dialogue.
and that that dialogue is inside dialoguehandler, so when u click on that npc it shows up
Dragons, Godwars (for example)
so u click godwars but where can i make that if u click on godwars it actualy tele u to godwars???
i have to put coordinates somewhere :s
if help me with this i repp++

item.title: [PI] NPC dialogue actions [PI] Repp++
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

clickingbuttons.java
add something like this, but u gotta find the case id

case #: if (c.inGWD()) { c.getPA().spellTeleport(COORDX, COORDY, 0); c.Arma = 15; c.Band = 15; c.Sara = 15; c.Zammy = 15; c.sendMessage("You teleport to Godwars!"); } break;

Read full topic
